Welcome

SPEAK is a Rapid Application Development framework for Sitecore focusing on UX.

You build SPEAK pages using standard Sitecore renderings. Such renderings are called SPEAK components.

A SPEAK component consists of a rendering item, a rendering parameters template, an MVC view and optionally a JavaScript file and a stylesheet file.

The SPEAK Fiddle allows you to play with a SPEAK component. You have the ability to edit the MVC View, the JavaScript/TypeScript file, the layout definition and data items.

Hello World

This is the basic Hello World SPEAK component. It contains no JavaScript and just outputs "Hello World" in the MVC view.

Click the Run button or press Ctrl+Enter button to generate the output.
